SR:
MA (09.08.2001 12:04:06)1. Open Eclipse and navigate to the preference page.
2. Select 'Workbench' -> 'File Editors'.
3. Without selecting anything from the 'Internal Editors' section, switch to the 'External Editors' section and select an entry.
4. Switch back to 'Internal Editors' and observe that there is still no selection.
5. Press OK.
6. Verify that the selected external editor has been added to the associated editors list.
